content.rendered:
Introducing the

Windsor Brokers App

Join the next generation of traders

Join the next generation of traders

Join the next generation of traders

Manage your
account seamlessly

Control your funds and receive important account notifications

Deposit and withdraw funds with a range of popular payment providers

Gain direct access to the MT4 platform

Save Favorites and focus on selected instruments

Customise Push Notifications

Analyse and improve
your performance

Assess your trades and get a better understanding of your trading performance.

  • Get the latest breaking news and exclusive insights from our market analysts

Get instant notifications on important market updates

Discover a wide range of innovative tools, and get notified of key market shifts as they happen.

  • View live prices and trend lines on major instruments
  • Navigate the latest charts and market sentiments
  • Get the latest breaking news and exclusive insights from our market analysts
  • View live prices and trend lines on major instruments
  • Navigate the latest charts and market sentiments

Switch to dark mode

Reduce eye strain and improve battery life.

Download the app
